entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
